results.definition: material suitable for manufacture or use or finishing
a natural fiber (raw cotton, wool, hemp, flax) that can be twisted to form yarn
examples: staple fibers vary widely in length

results.definition: (usually in the plural) a necessary commodity for which demand is constant
a short U-shaped wire nail for securing cables
necessary or important, especially regarding food or commodities
paper fastener consisting of a short length of U-shaped wire that can fasten papers together
secure or fasten with a staple or staples
